Fee Schedule

Source: vignettes/fee-schedule.Rmd
fee-schedule.Rmd
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
library(qs)

Return Information about HCPCS Code 

calc_amounts_df(hcpcs    = "11646", 
                state    = "GA", 
                locality = "99", 
                mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()

Fee Schedule Calculation 

rvu <- rvu(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  select(hcpcs, 
         description,
         wrvu, 
         nf_prvu, 
         f_prvu, 
         mrvu, 
         cf)

rvu |> glimpse()
> Rows: 1
> Columns: 7
> $ hcpcs        [3m [38;5;246m<chr> [39m [23m "11646"
> $ description  [3m [38;5;246m<chr> [39m [23m "Exc f/e/e/n/l mal+mrg >4 cm"
> $ wrvu         [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 6.26
> $ nf_prvu      [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 7.92
> $ f_prvu       [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 4.36
> $ mrvu         [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 0.99
> $ cf           [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 32.744
gp <- gpci(
  state    = "GA",
  locality = "99",
  mac      = "10212")

gp |> glimpse()
> Rows: 1
> Columns: 7
> $ mac       [3m [38;5;246m<chr> [39m [23m "10212"
> $ state     [3m [38;5;246m<fct> [39m [23m GA
> $ locality  [3m [38;5;246m<chr> [39m [23m "99"

> $ mgpci     [3m [38;5;246m<dbl> [39m [23m 1.125
calc_amounts(wrvu     = rvu$wrvu,
             prvu_nf  = rvu$nf_prvu,
             prvu_f   = rvu$f_prvu,
             mrvu     = rvu$mrvu,
             cf       = rvu$cf,
             wgpci    = gp$wgpci,
             pgpci    = gp$pgpci,
             mgpci    = gp$mgpci)
> Facility:
> Participating Amount    = $367.51
> Non-Particpating Amount = $349.13
> Limiting Charge         = $401.50
> 
> Non-Facility:
> Participating Amount    = $470.44
> Non-Particpating Amount = $446.91
> Limiting Charge         = $513.95
pfs(hcpcs    = "11646", 
    mac      = "10212",
    locality = "99") |> 
  select(hcpcs,
         mac,
         locality,
         fee_nf,
         fee_f) |> 
  glimpse()
>  [1m [33mError [39m in `select()`: [22m
>  [33m! [39m Can't subset columns that don't exist.
>  [31m✖ [39m Column `fee_nf` doesn't exist.
